params.amount: amount to deposit (in wei or token decimals)
params.recipient: the address credited in internal ledger
params.token: address(0) for native, otherwise ERC20 token address
token address to rescue (address(0) for native)

params.to: recipient external address where funds will be sent
params.token: address(0) for native, otherwise ERC20 token address

deposit(address,address,uint256).notice: Deposit funds for a recipient. If token == address(0) send native with msg.value.

rescue(address,address,uint256).notice: Owner rescue function - withdraw accidental tokens/native to `to`.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw balance for msg.sender (recipient). Withdraws native or ERC20 to `to`.
